snippet.title: Arena of Taryon┃Early Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
DISCLAIMER: Most of the footage seen in the video was captured in-game. The game is currently in early alpha testing and everything seen in the video is subject to change.

Hey there! First, we would like to thank you for watching and taking the time to read this description. We are proud to introduce you to our first game, Arena of Taryon, and the beginning of our game dev group: Taryon Games!

Arena of Taryon is a classic pixel roguelike experience with an immersive story and fun, challenging gameplay! Want to focus on the lore and discover the secrets of our world? Or do you prefer combat and action over dialogue? The choice is yours and you may pick both!

If you want to join us on this journey, join our discord server and become a part of the community! 
                            
  →  →  →   https://discord.com/invite/PcvBpJu9Hf   ←  ←  ←

We are looking to grow this community to at least a certain degree to gather more attention for the project as we are in need of more game testers and developers, especially artists. If you are interested in helping us please join the discord server, you will find all relevant information there.


- Taryon Games
